Motion3DFile
loopTime 120
isLoop 1
boneMotionDatas{ 4
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 0 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0 0
		time 0 0 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0 0
	}
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 1  0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
		time 60 1 -0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
	}
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 1  -0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
		time 60 1 0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
	}
	boneMotionData{ 4
		time 0 1 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
		time 60 1 0.000000 0.000000 -0.500000 60 0
		time 0 0 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 60 0
		time 60 0 0.000000 -2.000000 0.000000 60 0
	}
}
END
